class_description:
The root class from which all event state objects shall be derived. All Events are constructed with a reference to the object, the "source",
 that is logically deemed to be the object upon which the Event in question
 initially occurred upon.

params.param_description: The object on which the Event initially occurred.

return_description: The object on which the Event initially occurred.

Methods.method_description: The object on which the Event initially occurred.

return_description: A a String representation of this EventObject.

Methods.method_description: Returns a String representation of this EventObject.
